title: Disney stock falls as Disney+ growth slows even more than expected
text:
IRS releases new standard deductions and tax brackets as inflation soars

The IRS makes inflation adjustments yearly, but this year they coincided with hot October inflation data See full story.

Rivian Automotive stock soars in trading debut, in the largest IPO of the year

Rivian Automotive Inc. goes public on Wednesday in the largest initial public offering of the year and the seventh largest U.S. IPO by offer size in nearly 30 years. See full story.

‘A recipe for criminal-tax prosecution': An Ohio man won $1 million in the Powerball lottery, but falsely claimed $1 million in losses

Mustafa Shalash hid his winnings from the IRS by wiring the money to Jordan, prosecutors said. See full story.

From a sprint to a marathon — here's next year's top market themes from Goldman Sachs

Analysts at Goldman Sachs put their list of the top macro and market themes it expects to dominate the landscape for 2022. See full story.

MARKETWATCH PERSONAL FINANCE

This golden one-hour bedtime window is the best for your heart, new study finds See full story.
